4:
Set hotkey for snippet:
1. Click the "HotKey" button in the abbrevation text box above.
2. Set a hotkey (in this sample, the hotkey is Ctrl+Shift+H).

Note:
This sample group is disabled. If you want to test this snippet hotkey, enable this group.
In order to set snippet hotkey for both Windows and macOS, set it twice, once in Windows, and once in macOS.
